org.finra.jtaf.ewd

Interface HighlightProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultExtWebDriver

    public interface HighlightProvider
    HighlightProvider is a simple interface meant for ExtWebDriver implementations which support highlighting. Widget classes should check to see if a session is an instance of this interface, and also the value of isHighlight(), before performing highlighting-related operations.
